name: Construction Space
description:
I am a student pursuing a Master of Architecture degree, and made this game for a studio project. I'm interested in using video game mechanics and the multiplayer format to create tectonic forms and configurations.

The game itself parodies architectural 3D modeling software from the first-person perspective. Players 'build' constructions to traverse between platforms and collect blue artifacts. Each artifact triggers a change in gravity and generates a new platform and artifact to move toward. Each shift allows you to see and interact with your construction from a new perspective.

At the end, export your construction as an OBJ file!
